title: update causing lag?
body: i recently upgraded my internet speed because i have been lagging in matches and it greatly impacts the timing of thing. but this did not help any i also changed my settings to low spec mode to help wit FPS also didn't help any so im curious is anybody else having lag issues after the client update or with recent patches?

replies.body:
Your internet has *nothing* to do with FPS.

Start by listing your hardware, internet configuration and service, framerate averages, ping time, and when you see lag occurring.
